scene_description_enriched: Two haloed women stand facing each other. The woman on the left wears a black habit with gold trim and a veil, her head bowed. The woman on the right wears a blue garment beneath a pink mantle and veil, her head tilted slightly. Both women have their hands clasped or held near their chests. The background is a vibrant blue sky, with a hint of green landscape at the bottom. The scene is framed by a decorative border with gold ornamentation.
